snippet.title: Shadow Guardian - iPhone/iPad - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadow Guardian is on its way to iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. 

The most beautiful action/adventure game will be available from December 16th. 

Keep in touch and visit www.shadowguardian-thegame.com

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
